Class Character

java.lang.Object
Character
public class Character extends Object
Represents the player's character in the game, equipped with armor and a weapon. Handles combat stats, opponent targeting, and charge/defend state.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Character(Armor armor, Weapon weapon)
    Constructs a new player character using the given armor and weapon.

  • Constructor Details

    • Character

      public Character(Armor armor, Weapon weapon)
      Constructs a new player character using the given armor and weapon. Initializes the character's stats (HP, attack, defense, speed) based on equipment.
      Parameters:
      armor - the armor selected by the player (affects defense and speed)
      weapon - the weapon selected by the player (affects attack)

  • Method Details

    • SetOpponent

      public void SetOpponent(Opponent enemy)
      Sets the opponent for the player.
      Parameters:
      enemy - the opponent to assign

    • SetHP

      public void SetHP(int value)
      Adjusts the player's HP by a given value. Positive values heal; negative values inflict damage.
      Parameters:
      value - the amount to adjust HP

    • GetHP

      public int GetHP()
      Gets the current HP of the player.
      Returns:
      the current HP

    • SetAttack

      public void SetAttack(int Value)
      Sets the player's attack stat directly.
      Parameters:
      Value - new attack value

    • GetAttack

      public int GetAttack()
      Gets the player's current attack stat.
      Returns:
      the current attack

    • Defend

      public void Defend(boolean value)
      Sets the player's defense state.
      Parameters:
      value - true if defending, false otherwise

    • isDefended

      public boolean isDefended()
      Checks if the player is currently defending.
      Returns:
      true if defending, false otherwise

    • GetDefense

      public int GetDefense()
      Gets the player's defense stat.
      Returns:
      the defense value

    • GetSpeed

      public int GetSpeed()
      Gets the player's speed stat.
      Returns:
      the speed value

    • Attack

      public void Attack(int Damage)
      Applies damage to the opponent based on attack value.
      Parameters:
      Damage - the amount of damage to deal

    • isCharged

      public boolean isCharged()
      Indicates whether the player has charged their attack.
      Returns:
      true if charged, false otherwise

    • Charge

      public void Charge(boolean Condition)
      Sets the player's charged state.
      Parameters:
      Condition - true to set as charged, false otherwise
